devdoc.details: Changes include:  1. Remove Bancor's specific functions and replace SafeMath with OpenZeppelin's.  2. Change code from Contract to Library and change maxExpArray from being array     with binary search inside `findPositionInMaxExpArray` to a simple linear search.  3. Add requirement check that baseN >= baseD (this is always true for Bancor). Licensed under Apache Lisense, Version 2.0.
devdoc.title: BancorPower, modified from the original "BancorFomula.sol"        written by Bancor https://github.com/bancorprotocol/contracts
